issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Android and iOS support cancelAllAnimations() on Ti.UI.View. When called, it will cancel all in progress animations.

When the animations are cancelled, it is undetermined if the animations should stop, reset, or go to the finish state. I proposed Ti.UI.ANIMATION_STOP, Ti.UI.ANIMATION_RESET, and Ti.UI.ANIMATION_FINISH constants. The default value when no arguments are passed in should probably be ANIMATION_STOP, but could also be ANIMATION_RESET.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Add support for cancelAllAnimations() to Ti._.UI.Element

comments.body: Resolving as "Won't Fix" as MobileWeb has been deprecated.
